Locale.smartHomeAnswer: Quiet all worries about your home with a quick glance at your phone or tablet. The devices and appliances in your home can communicate with each other and with you.
Locale.howReply:
How to make controls in Smart Home system?
How to efficiently manage my home energy? How to quickly start a Movie Night for my family? How to wake up my daughter in the early morning when I am away from home?
Achieve device symbiosis through group working with simple operation and easy control
